topic.fullpath: Topic :: Communications :: Chat :: AOL Instant Messenger

name: J. Jab. Lite
short_description: J.Jab. Lite is a lightweight Jabber client written as a Java 1.4.1 applet. Allows users to chat with others on Jabber, AIM, ICQ, MSN, and Yahoo im systems. Has a slimmed down version written in java 1.1.7 that allows simple group chat and moderator access
